players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so she was town. Diana, why did you remain silent? Charlie, what are your thoughts?"
Charlie: "I think it's too early to make accusations. We should all share our thoughts and look for inconsistencies in voting patterns."
You: "I agree with Charlie, we need to discuss more before voting. Diana, your silence is suspicious though."
Charlie: "I agree we need more discussion before voting. Diana, your continued silence is concerning. Bob seems reasonable so far."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
